Text:
function EP03_01_01()
    --.序章-1【7月第1週】「こんなこともあろうかと」
    SaveData.Title = "こんなこともあろうかと"

SAVE()

    -- 【指示説明】

    --　//BG：背景の指定
    --　//BU：バストアップの指定
    --　//SE：効果音の指定
    --　//CI：カットインの指定
    --　//effect：演出の希望
    --　◆：シーン切り替え
    --　￥：黒塗りハートの記号（主にエルメスが多用）

    -- 第３話「ボク姫様と姫のカゴ」

    -- 12345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890

    --//BG：アキラ宅
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG023aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    --//effect：文字サイズ大
    -- wiz : 要検討

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0402.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "This is a huge crisisーーーーーーッッッ!？？！？" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    --//BU：アキラ（悲しみ・部屋着）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_BGM("BGM03.wav")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0268.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "What is it, coming back home all of a sudden? I'm busy leveling up in Disgaea right now." ]])

    MSG([[ Akira, playing a game in the living room, spoke without looking away from the TV. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0403.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Ah, swimming classes start tomorrow! I'm a guy... what am I supposed to do...!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0269.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Wow. That's tough, huh." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0270.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Well, setting that aside, check out this Lord Val here. I've reincarnated repeatedly and raised him to be the strongest." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0404.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I can't just set it aside!? W-Well, sure, that lord is amazing, but!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ While I frantically explained the seriousness of the situation, Akira listened casually while playing her game. ]])

    MSG([[ H-Huh? Why does she seem so uninterested...? This is a huge crisis where my gender might get revealed. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0271.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Why don’t you just skip because you’re not feeling well?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0405.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I'm already a 'Princess'... I can't skip without a proper reason." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0272.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Then you should just say it's because of your period, like I told you before. It's a delicate topic, so no one asks too deeply. I used that trick often myself." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0273.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Actually, you once got through PE class like that before, right?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0406.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Well, the problem is… Hiyu-san memorized the fake cycle I told the teacher." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0407.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "It’s so different from the real timing that this fake excuse won’t work now." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0274.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Eh... what kind of person is that? That’s seriously creepy... Why do they know someone else’s period schedule?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0275.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Isn’t that a potential criminal?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0408.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "N-No! She’s just worried about my health! P-Probably..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I had thought Hiyu was the only friend who would know my cycle. ]])

    MSG([[ But that really is strange. I’ve learned another part of girl culture. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0409.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "A-Anyway… I have to do something about this. What should I do?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0276.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Well, you’ll have to wear a swimsuit and take part. Yuriai’s swimwear, like the uniforms, can be freely arranged, right?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0410.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Eh. Y-Yeah… I guess so." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03eb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0277.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "In case something like this happened, I prepared a swimsuit perfect to hide Minachin’s gender." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ja")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0411.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "A-Akira~~~~…" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I was impressed by how well-prepared she was, explaining her confidence. ]])

    MSG([[ As expected of Akira. She really doesn’t miss a thing. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ja")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0412.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Thank you… I’m really sorry for always relying on you…" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0278.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Fufufuーn<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> If you’re so grateful, you could add pudding for today’s dessert, you know? With whipped cream too, if you want?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0413.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I’ll make lots of pudding. I’ll add whipped cream and ice cream too." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0279.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Yay!" ]])

    MSG([[ So I faced the biggest crisis of my cross-dressing history—swimming class—with the swimsuit Akira had arranged for me. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    --　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("EP03_02")

end
